name: First International Conference on Advances in Physical Sciences and Materials 2020
content: All the accepted papers of ICAPSM 2020 will be published in the IOP Science : Journal of Physics (JPCS) , a conference proceedings journal which is indexed in CPCI – Web of Science (Thomson Reuters), SCOPUS, Inspec, International Nuclear Information System (INIS), NASA – ADS, Chemical Abstracts, Polymer Library, etc.
